blogPost.excerpt: It's often difficult for most people to share their thoughts and over time it builds up in them, to let people have these thoughts free and release their burden we build this app. Here everyone can write freely without being getting judged by others.
blogPost.body: It's often difficult for most people to share their thoughts and over time it builds up in them, to let people have these thoughts free and release their burden we build this app. Here everyone can write freely without being getting judged by others.
blogPost.title: Articled - Write where your words matter | Read & write short stories.
blogPost.author: Sajal Rai

localize.description: 对于大多数人来说，往往很难分享自己的想法，久而久之就会积压在心里，为了让大家有这些想法自由，释放自己的负担，我们建立了这个应用。在这里，每个人都可以自由写作，而不会被别人评头论足。
localize.tagline: 写在你的文字重要的地方｜阅读和写短篇小说。

localize.description: 對於大多數人來說，往往很難分享自己的想法，久而久之就會積壓在心裏，爲了讓大家有這些想法自由，釋放自己的負擔，我們建立了這個應用。在這裏，每個人都可以自由寫作，而不會被別人評頭論足。
localize.tagline: 寫在你的文字重要的地方｜閱讀和寫短篇小說。

previous.excerpt: AI Conversation Flow is a powerful virtual email conversation builder to help marketing teams convert neglected leads into sales-ready hand-raisers.
previous.title: Saleswhale Email AI Conversation Flow - A new way to build intent-based lead conversion campaigns

localize.description: AI Conversation Flow是一个强大的虚拟电子邮件对话构建器，帮助营销团队将被忽视的潜在客户转化为销售准备好的举手之劳。
localize.tagline: 建立基于意图的线索转化活动的新方法

localize.description: AI Conversation Flow是一個強大的虛擬電子郵件對話構建器，幫助營銷團隊將被忽視的潛在客戶轉化爲銷售準備好的舉手之勞。
localize.tagline: 建立基於意圖的線索轉化活動的新方法

next.excerpt: Zoho Mail Bookmarks is integrated with your Zoho Inbox and can be accessed from anywhere. With this plugin, you can easily save any URL/ link to your Zoho Mail Bookmarks for your personal reference or to share with your team.
next.title: Zoho Mail Bookmarks - Save any URL link from your browser

localize.description: Zoho邮件书签与您的Zoho收件箱集成，可以从任何地方访问。有了这个插件，您可以轻松地将任何URL/链接保存到您的Zoho邮件书签中，供您个人参考或与您的团队分享。
localize.tagline: 从浏览器中保存任何URL链接

localize.description: Zoho郵件書籤與您的Zoho收件箱集成，可以從任何地方訪問。有了這個插件，您可以輕鬆地將任何URL/鏈接保存到您的Zoho郵件書籤中，供您個人參考或與您的團隊分享。
localize.tagline: 從瀏覽器中保存任何URL鏈接
